name: ng-mocks
description: A library creating angular mock components, directives, pipes, services, providers and modules in unit tests, which also includes shallow rendering and precise stubs to dump child dependencies.

scripts.build:all: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.i:a: npm run i:a5 & npm run i:a6 & npm run i:a7 & npm run i:a8 & npm run i:a9 & npm run i:a10 & npm run i:a11 & wait
scripts.i:a5: npm run i:a5es5 && npm run i:a5es2015
scripts.s:a: npm run s:a5 & npm run s:a6 & npm run s:a7 & npm run s:a8 & npm run s:a9 & npm run s:a10 & npm run s:a11 & wait
scripts.s:a5: npm run s:a5es5 && npm run s:a5es2015
scripts.s:a5es5: P=e2e/a5es5/node_modules/ng-mocks && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R dist $P && cp package.json $P
scripts.s:a5es2015: P=e2e/a5es2015/node_modules/ng-mocks && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R dist $P && cp package.json $P
scripts.s:a6: P=e2e/a6/node_modules/ng-mocks && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R dist $P && cp package.json $P
scripts.s:a7: P=e2e/a7/node_modules/ng-mocks && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R dist $P && cp package.json $P
scripts.s:a8: P=e2e/a8/node_modules/ng-mocks && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R dist $P && cp package.json $P
scripts.s:a9: P=e2e/a9/node_modules/ng-mocks && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R dist $P && cp package.json $P
scripts.s:a10: P=e2e/a10/node_modules/ng-mocks && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R dist $P && cp package.json $P
scripts.s:a11: P=e2e/a11/node_modules/ng-mocks && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R dist $P && cp package.json $P
scripts.clear:a: npm run clear:a5 & npm run clear:a6 & npm run clear:a7 & npm run clear:a8 & npm run clear:a9 & npm run clear:a10 & npm run clear:a11 & wait
scripts.clear:a5: npm run clear:a5es5 && npm run clear:a5es2015
scripts.s:test:a: npm run s:test:a5 & npm run s:test:a6 & npm run s:test:a7 & npm run s:test:a8 & npm run s:test:a9 & npm run s:test:a10 & npm run s:test:a11 & wait
scripts.s:test:a5: npm run s:test:a5es5 && npm run s:test:a5es2015
scripts.s:test:a5es5: P=e2e/a5es5/src/test && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R tests $P && cp -R examples $P && rm $P/examples/TestRoutingGuard/test.spec.ts && rm $P/examples/TestRoutingResolver/test.spec.ts
scripts.s:test:a5es2015: P=e2e/a5es2015/src/test && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R tests $P && cp -R examples $P && rm $P/examples/TestRoutingGuard/test.spec.ts && rm $P/examples/TestRoutingResolver/test.spec.ts
scripts.s:test:a6: P=e2e/a6/src/test && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R tests $P && cp -R examples $P
scripts.s:test:a7: P=e2e/a7/src/test && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R tests $P && cp -R examples $P
scripts.s:test:a8: P=e2e/a8/src/test && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R tests $P && cp -R examples $P
scripts.s:test:a9: P=e2e/a9/src/test && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R tests $P && cp -R examples $P
scripts.s:test:a10: P=e2e/a10/src/test && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R tests $P && cp -R examples $P
scripts.s:test:a11: P=e2e/a11/src/test && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R tests $P && cp -R examples $P
scripts.e2e: npm run build && npm run i:a && npm run clear:a && npm run s:a && npm run s:test:a && npm run test:a
scripts.test:a: npm run test:a5 && npm run test:a6 && npm run test:a7 &&npm run test:a8 && npm run test:a9 && npm run test:a10 && npm run test:a11
scripts.test:a5: npm run test:a5es5 && npm run test:a5es2015
